skill.name: Destiny Draw
skill.description: Can be used when your Life Points decrease by 2000. In the Draw Phase, instead of conducting your normal draw, draw a card of your choice. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

children.content: keys to duel at the gate
He appears at the gate at Stage 15 (unless chosen as your starting character)
Yami Yugi Level 40 appears at the gate upon reaching Stage 30
Pick as a starter character (or reach Stage 15 in DM Duel World if you choose
Use a Spell Card 5 time(s) in one Duel.
and win 1 Duel(s) against Yami Yugi at level 30 in Duel World.

linkedArticle.description: Everything you need to know about farming Sera. Her decklists, card rewards, top level farm decks with strategy information and free to play card replacements. This article will help you farm her as efficiently as possible.
linkedArticle.title: How to Farm Sera

children.content: keys to duel at the gate.
Unlike her event, monsters require Tributes.
Reduce your opponent's LP to 0 by inflicting battle damage with
in a Duel against Sera at level 30 using
Achieve 1 Comeback Victory(ies) in Duels against Sera at level 30 using
Use level 7 or higher Monster Cards 2 time(s) in one Duel against Sera at level 30 using
Achieve 1 win(s) without using any level 3 or lower Monster Cards in Duels against Sera at level 30 using
Achieve 1 win(s) using LIGHT Monster Cards in Duels against Sera at level 30 using

skill.name: Tuner Level Balancer
skill.description: Increase or decrease the level of 1 “T.G.” Tuner Monster you control by 2, until the end of the turn. This Skill can only be used once per turn. If you use this Skill to increase/decrease the Level of a monster other than a Synchro Monster, you cannot use this Skill again the rest of the Duel. You cannnot Special Summon any monsters from your Extra Deck other than Synchro Monsters during the turn you activate this Skill.

linkedArticle.description: Everything you need to know about farming Antinomy. His decklists, card rewards, top level farm decks with strategy information and free to play card replacements. This article will help you farm him as efficiently as possible.
linkedArticle.title: How to Farm Antinomy

children.content: keys to duel at the gate
You will see Antinomy's unlock missions upon reaching Stage 6 or above in Duel World (5Ds)
Antinomy has several cards for the Tech Genus archetype, primarily
and win 1 Duel(s) against Antinomy at level 30 in Duel World.
Perform 3 Synchro Summon(s) in one Duel against Antinomy using
Use a Trap Card 3 time(s) in one Duel against Antinomy.
Reduce your opponent's LP to 0 by inflicting battle damage with
in a Duel against Antinomy at level 30.

skill.name: Sealed Tombs
skill.description: Can be used if your Life Points are lower than your opponent's by 1000 or more. Until the end of your opponent's next turn, neither player can banish cards from the Graveyard or Special Summon monsters from the Graveyard. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

children.content: keys to duel at the gate
Ishizu Ishtar level 40 appears at the gate upon reaching stage 30
Summon LIGHT Monster(s) 200 time(s) in total.
Win 1 Duel (s) against Ishizu Ishtar at Level 30 in Duel World.
Win a Duel against Ishizu Ishatar with at least 6,000 LP remaining.
